about_the_game:
Ferguson and Mira's love came from childhood. There was no one in town who didn't know about their love. They had a very happy relationship and were preparing for a wedding. But that day would be a turning point for both of them. Ferguson was a scientist and was doing work that no one knew at the time. Illegal work...

It was time to get married, everything was ready and they were very happy. Just as they were getting married, the military army entered. Ferguson knew why they were there. Mira was killed by a bullet from Werner's gun while trying to escape. While Ferguson was experiencing the pain of that moment, Werner was putting handcuffs on his arm, laughing. And at that moment he vowed to inflict the same pain on Werner.

Ferguson was sentenced to 427 years in prison, but he managed to escape and disappear in the 4th month. He lived in a cave for many years, engaged in many experiments, made connections with aliens and was very little time away from the revenge he wanted. The ocean city where Werner lived was attacked from space.

The city was destroyed, many people were killed. Werner was looking for his wife in the hospital but couldn't find her. Then he received a message on his phone and realised that his wife was in the city.

Werner was returning to the city. Hunger, thirst, could he endure it? And would he find Ferguson in the big city? What about his wife? Could he save his wife alive?


Open World:
The island country, which is also inhabited by looters, is waiting to be discovered.

First Person Camera Angle:
Witness the whole thing with your own eyes.

Looting:
In order to survive, you may need to loot basic necessities from the looters' own locations.

Weapons:
You'll have a full automatic and a pistol to defend yourself from looters. But remember, your ammo is limited...
